author.name: Adam Stawarek
author.bio:
Hi, my name is Adam Stawarek.

I’m a software engineer by trade and a passionate one at that. When I’m not glued to my screen, you’ll find me out running or taking care of my aquarium and its colorful residents. 

I started this blog to get better at writing technical documentation. Let’s face it, everyone complains about the lack of it, but no one actually wants to write it ;) For me, it’s also a way to organize my thoughts and really get a grip on the concepts I’m writing about.

blog.title: Adam's crypt
blog.description: Code snippets, system design ideas, and occasionally rants about the software industry.
